Here are examples with restrictions on peak heights and valley 

   heights



      Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
                     2  2                  
                    P  x  + P x - P + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21, 51, 127, 323, 835, 2188, 5798, 15511, 41835, 

  113634, 310572, 853467, 2356779, 6536382, 18199284, 50852019, 

  142547559, 400763223, 1129760415, 3192727797, 9043402501, 

  25669818476, 73007772802, 208023278209, 593742784829, 

  1697385471211, 4859761676391, 13933569346707, 40002464776083, 

  114988706524270, 330931069469828, 953467954114363, 

  2750016719520991, 7939655757745265, 22944749046030949, 

  66368199913921497, 192137918101841817, 556704809728838604, 

  1614282136160911722, 4684478925507420069, 13603677110519480289, 

  39532221379621112004, 114956499435014161638, 

  334496473194459009429, 973899740488107474693, 

  2837208756709314025578, 8270140811590103129028, 

  24119587499879368045581, 70380687801729972163737, 

  205473381836953330090977, 600161698382141668958313, 

  1753816895177229449263803, 5127391665653918424581931, 

  14996791899280244858336604, 43881711243248048262611670, 

  128453535912993825479057919, 376166554620363320971336899, 

  1101997131244113831001323618, 3229547920421385142120565580, 

  9468017265749942384739441267, 27766917351255946264000229811, 

  81459755507915876737297376646, 239056762740830735069669439852, 

  701774105036927170410592656651, 

  2060763101398061220299787957807, 

  6053261625552368838017538638577, 

  17785981695172350686294020499397, 

  52274487460035748810950928411209, 

  153681622703766437645990598724233, 

  451929928113276686826984901736388, 

  1329334277731700374912787442584082, 

  3911184337415864255099077969308357, 

  11510402374965653734436362305721089, 

  33882709435158403490429948661355518, 

  99762777233730236158474945885114348, 

  293804991106867190838370294149325217, 

  865461205861621792586606565768282577, 

  2549948950073051466077548390833960154, 

  7514646250637159480132421134685515996, 

  22150145406114764734833589779994282345, 

  65303054248346999524711654923215773701, 

  192564948449128362785882746541078077821, 

  567944426681696509718034692302003744197, 

  1675395722976475387857861526496400455935, 

  4943221572052274428484817274841589781103, 

  14587540897567180436019575590444202957764, 

  43055804394719442101962182766220627765254, 

  127103430617648266466982424978107271745123, 

  375281510930976756310181851730346874521559, 

  1108229819877900763405338193186744667723583, 

  3273209089476438052473101825635320104642103, 

  9669131152389329200998265687814683780583133, 

  28567321136213468215221364999058944720713501, 

  84414794291793480358891042199686850901302514, 

  249478578991224378680142561460010030467811580, 

  737415571391164350797051905752637361193303669]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
              No peak height can belong to {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
 4  2    2  3   1  2  2      3        2   3       1  2   1      
x  P  - P  x  + - P  x  + P x  - 2 P x  + - P x + - x  - - P - x
                2                         2       2      2      

     1    
   + - = 0
     2    


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 6, 17, 43, 102, 238, 562, 1354, 3316, 8204, 

  20421, 51059, 128198, 323222, 818222, 2079038, 5300540, 

  13555028, 34760266, 89365374, 230290012, 594739276, 1539065764, 

  3990307252, 10363807912, 26961664792, 70249548973, 

  183302815427, 478945811526, 1253029639910, 3282183994582, 

  8607212588406, 22596117913708, 59381686528900, 156205434562270, 

  411285915339082, 1083867722675444, 2858745487844772, 

  7546137381729980, 19934635238732876, 52700123935487192, 

  139418709775176104, 369082744807466786, 977704583790803438, 

  2591561264441866268, 6873446985736038268, 18240508822760370252, 

  48432747866505726508, 128668471616019727064, 

  342001182346412343624, 909489145833171515444, 

  2419771280121891879836, 6440963370574410533624, 

  17152216525671422654552, 45695782471427055935560, 

  121790184737038445334504, 324730377769024254682192, 

  866168604562646658349616, 2311242667239399531051645, 

  6169460446480324437794915, 16474131358179436268890694, 

  44005499700140360537512838, 117586124100172588701281894, 

  314300929809130400231027110, 840372236301611969514507852, 

  2247658383577192009388477284, 6013368126972069153473948758, 

  16092762773561955879417925522, 43078974421919362718029414276, 

  115350309402483675483065971636, 308949642636650325248142025036, 

  827692732144179901925984803804, 

  2217993145269888878922462759416, 

  5945085208774619854685848817928, 

  15938964790570420266637125138518, 

  42742871989853807612065573853818, 

  114647968084329789544497835604532, 

  307585387778373353944884551218708, 

  825390378312867224980291416483364, 

  2215364736413904894208419941264260, 

  5947316592201767212321531948039048, 

  15969259671855876675850753578359384, 

  42887863066881629289195956250281292, 

  115204115445738878732734446867924260, 

  309516401702557694837498869231237000, 

  831724737413868176654804009984459688, 

  2235394066746489061719714881554881016, 

  6009044196867728236201975615995542488, 

  16155927318709828672651079583198207280, 

  43444217782083113420341055245323962704, 

  116843385811318748865523311923170850258, 

  314301788603091251290620881197611621966, 

  845587772522816472700545334031801910044, 

  2275297852787407202916060047734210930652, 

  6123280874737406880720801288877943711996, 

  16481439754660007602834413836339310409148, 

  44368002417538695679711183654223511050360]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
             No valley height can belong to {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
          2  4        2            2                  
         P  x  - 2 P x  + 3 P x + x  - P - 2 x + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21, 50, 120, 290, 706, 1732, 4280, 10645, 26625, 

  66922, 168944, 428174, 1089038, 2778908, 7112024, 18251290, 

  46954898, 121079796, 312890000, 810167236, 2101654276, 

  5461324936, 14214663472, 37053835213, 96727047065, 

  252839278618, 661743647712, 1734016337814, 4548903879062, 

  11946060726060, 31403875878296, 82634297331886, 

  217638419272342, 573706761121820, 1513581873172048, 

  3996381851391324, 10559851450962460, 27923128221481400, 

  73887732381667472, 195645573128088962, 518376513726222074, 

  1374317586475192964, 3645733624433912608, 9676737380172026252, 

  25698624192457062540, 68283993528529014552, 

  181529734847384342512, 482823724372386282324, 

  1284795353148373536196, 3420399101996969804840, 

  9109832344766385346976, 24273276161233031693704, 

  64703052845527178772488, 172541573237801475884304, 

  460288218498675039654240, 1228366213652154723716797, 

  3279312321126818692390857, 8757695799697586455404154, 

  23396157876742136875321280, 62523387416250740164037606, 

  167139681009065943903488998, 446942624883696346455017420, 

  1195515770592228870821515800, 3198795832420909073726009894, 

  8561343286772201591246982574, 22920185128739589266141460748, 

  61377886105768861805842994128, 164406972675521699718068910316, 

  440494065675846602395832697004, 

  1180506966254829725566777201880, 

  3164484382523201900692892906704, 

  8484780663560958315110353021494, 

  22755112826262206788163021212638, 

  61040153685763014853640938173932, 

  163775195589421390080020027717280, 

  439515538924780096179517985255012, 

  1179754755344917152137606210734948, 

  3167367875999691873865274898477256, 

  8505355960280152039624529564809808, 

  22843976907573410362137512989640620, 

  61366908655687373506044041524080444, 

  164883896944843195950421887995951064, 

  443100164900230544445275165257834208, 

  1190977395323868098085104600048435640, 

  3201705538202486466072153872854699832, 

  8608627058467350323686558114316884336, 

  23150451538398912547442847310918633120, 

  62266804884572179370143360598919339410, 

  167503452544619980400256367841917846858, 

  450670966939271467850350195482920366628, 

  1212725884947956760096211142065830354496, 

  3263860714208225420289771861473125670780, 

  8785473710760008247224931354051844846460, 

  23651684657693494235483958559300777656056, 

  63682642486957508990219992112306988206960, 

  171490859315690966192021958365898732088460]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
              No peak height can belong to {3r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
   2  5      2  4      2  3    2  2        3        2        
  P  x  - 3 P  x  + 3 P  x  - P  x  - 4 P x  + 6 P x  - 4 P x

          2                  
     - 2 x  + P + 3 x - 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 6, 18, 50, 132, 340, 869, 2223, 5712, 14756, 

  38318, 99970, 261906, 688722, 1817262, 4810022, 12768276, 

  33984844, 90683217, 242540751, 650117730, 1746173466, 

  4699095943, 12668371945, 34210473074, 92530564278, 

  250644861380, 679896313744, 1846726579014, 5022349655942, 

  13674974717000, 37276434067852, 101719781605956, 

  277853907510932, 759706913872388, 2079093797730468, 

  5694844204570772, 15611763172685844, 42831978392369318, 

  117602125782681498, 323131143264935808, 888476016132393112, 

  2444574648073629481, 6730383504743412455, 18541468957478735170, 

  51109994285740750130, 140966214241982421601, 

  389011504271911340975, 1074086511541483698558, 

  2967134067230702153394, 8200650218002706011707, 

  22675932249285326096009, 62730777933797880859344, 

  173615353914301778137160, 480707755418396974061083, 

  1331538078074548518636857, 3689773678196189522009922, 

  10228549003245645652365014, 28365552077492549294168336, 

  78691232313621225019366468, 218380854641502081730991506, 

  606249386927427209868995090, 1683574070672936626516361790, 

  4676846621359289728881117334, 12996009080569259511880621028, 

  36124265920604388224664650044, 100442271551879688972390589638, 

  279356620529239094638492026834, 777182434365294113075602480116, 

  2162744935838536958933099842852, 

  6020087902551422253081553111980, 

  16761487835512244188281553607836, 

  46680083349262554090830311133060, 

  130034092273883014805073407877796, 

  362315338823064784169793061671264, 

  1009758514469576475501829122014952, 

  2814797554580626628801531933945312, 

  7848257757537161560427398399372000, 

  21887366086856804059182891615438016, 

  61052812811578295691615916937416576, 

  170336469838655017652381104044860120, 

  475332302135051393702632049505686712, 

  1326700028548234177759762032061040426, 

  3703667083184084721235819769351075510, 

  10341250836007671890567828269035256612, 

  28879809644995705868291172785845311316, 

  80666638197652823825207832822099926402, 

  225356598202159797746235648413065151694, 

  629682541209006525332059385650599926068, 

  1759731855592590203370858930352528265612,

  13750247191738525045367713589718881004619,

  107510428906393850332716314374915666921098,

                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
No peak height can belong to {2r+1} and no valley can belong to 

   {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
       2  4      3        2            2                  
      P  x  + P x  - 3 P x  + 3 P x + x  - P - 2 x + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 6, 16, 36, 73, 145, 301, 661, 1491, 3355, 7463, 

  16511, 36675, 82179, 185539, 420547, 954508, 2168384, 4934370, 

  11256454, 25745367, 59013711, 135504851, 311590891, 717493570, 

  1654500838, 3820572376, 8834243756, 20452305371, 47402851387, 

  109983246411, 255439998251, 593847187518, 1381864377450, 

  3218406038520, 7502070059732, 17501227416947, 40858983826987, 

  95460651549007, 223185462053607, 522154975247799, 

  1222398493645847, 2863483131345935, 6711726531884063, 

  15740617443015925, 36935828026661397, 86716879989909541, 

  203695195043107461, 478708680515134956, 1125557448891291224, 

  2647663262491183654, 6230885883172503586, 14669739246097661761, 

  34552099084331127721, 81414191113586038901, 

  191908357123558820797, 452533244644681537291, 

  1067492643715291031475, 2519023937482122705519, 

  5946317822953666619495, 14041321435284474358931, 

  33167114913250268493203, 78368809803891683560339, 

  185229779350631718229395, 437932011308107730621550, 

  1035684249140628886902426, 2450019071534109844820616, 

  5797352724283517941767396, 13721608723530056297125371, 

  32485711796957670097629651, 76928791642127733910660647, 

  182218232792505388494647391, 431716331603509707888963921, 

  1023072203625858058972950601, 2425005776456114569968630333, 

  5749307930834118629144464485, 13633656989526641892894072281, 

  32337090325276502385273292441, 76714800273998850277640919961, 

  182030831887939140009972449305, 432012516264845609215792954828, 

  1025489828244836071453240652936, 

  2434715232137441964021964724862, 

  5781559167822447692153034763018, 

  13731564423317252746220143708005, 

  32619073295143049390462372964685, 

  77499364447134669690270295496089, 

  184161144194887453475529393917281, 

  437693077173534595620676562798308, 

  1040427147968415446664468369524568, 

  2473560632244589915056291840957538, 

  5881673820515559158695088739200870, 

  13987672336490694535717186889287061, 

  33270152373252228085285480481701557, 

  79145764914733835213742012710253669, 

  188305448393781617596694095570323973, 

  448083760511722162130053742881314538]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
           No peak height can belong to {2*r+1,3*r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
      27  2   1     1       5   13  6    7       3   55  4
4 x - -- x  + - P - - + 18 x  - -- x  + x  + 25 x  - -- x 
      2       2     2           2                    2    

      9  2   9           2     1  2  2       3        3  2
   + x  P  - - x P + 18 x  P - - x  P  - 42 x  P + 4 x  P 
             2                 2                          

     125  4         4  2   121  5         5  2       6  
   + --- x  P - 14 x  P  - --- x  P + 28 x  P  + 37 x  P
      2                     2                           

     69  6  2       7         7  2      8     21  8  2    10  2   
   - -- x  P  - 13 x  P + 26 x  P  + 2 x  P - -- x  P  + x   P  = 
     2                                        2                   

  0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 6, 17, 43, 101, 229, 514, 1156, 2614, 5942, 

  13571, 31145, 71856, 166720, 389027, 912761, 2152849, 5103545, 

  12158950, 29112228, 70049006, 169376206, 411509990, 1004422774, 

  2462480224, 6062441272, 14984121911, 37171518441, 92527306184, 

  231045192808, 578603880912, 1452839447904, 3656838022125, 

  9224688244353, 23316755353999, 59043794636251, 149760107085817, 

  380422646542217, 967662417362679, 2464413856733027, 

  6283277746951596, 16036054188755112, 40964529970176304, 

  104732757389019912, 267972367431397069, 686124193045364669, 

  1757908125249536210, 4506595839383567948, 11559546842860251567, 

  29665777067161556739, 76169003357162243108, 

  195656848814002034210, 502798749473964852065, 

  1292602852793654454937, 3324286216169474209584, 

  8552354378945777327926, 22009969313955072352387, 

  56662133004235800056999, 145915045710669304664421, 

  375868074422138939098929, 968487590338144071636601, 

  2496154382606684302996345, 6435221258086260769563408, 

  16594586296755021813316606, 42803258338218055026115450, 

  110431125992006089216646962, 284975477338985550404921062, 

  735566690183522008319907678, 1899033521569088576342324036, 

  4903845940934633179594115508, 12665792106093183534274878199, 

  32720287389771414897437952693, 84545220193852383682372094114, 

  218497405865266576639892734038, 564789944722455598368285580843, 

  1460189844957355278489047845881, 

  3775823740544427632683631191819, 

  9765455706707651644477578160459, 

  25260979198000747636773446320639, 

  65355662395389488244788967518311, 

  169118139395837164984888733405010, 

  437693101075321229874385242191950, 

  1132975187577646567530743010412741, 

  2933195265951395729352778814758503, 

  7595041655385530482876553516343993, 

  19669200976493917980312692229367353, 

  50945924472758327766006922358317564, 

  131976673995357862793387558517966634, 

  341939108031338656854631105281328886, 

  886059982312789868652714845537570430, 

  2296355600121263476928173603976308806, 

  5952176127963701162654519401146018806, 

  15430215414308921792370032244311931164, 

  40006151985534892025287349237954842460, 

  103738309039926004098416024270999391915, 

  269034626741527630938478496007611453801, 

  697803091509326335359185501818510798014]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
 No peak height can belong to {2*r+1} and no valley height can 

    belong to {3*r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
      27  2   1     1       5   7  6    7       3       4    9  2
4 x - -- x  + - P - - + 16 x  - - x  - x  + 25 x  - 27 x  + x  P 
      2       2     2           2                                

     9           2     1  2  2       3        3  2   123  4  
   - - x P + 18 x  P - - x  P  - 42 x  P + 4 x  P  + --- x  P
     2                 2                              2      

     27  4  2   111  5         5  2   55  6         6  2   9  7  
   - -- x  P  - --- x  P + 25 x  P  + -- x  P - 27 x  P  - - x  P
     2           2                    2                    2     

         7  2    8     9  8  2   1  8    
   + 16 x  P  - x  P - - x  P  + - x  = 0
                       2         2       


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 6, 16, 36, 73, 145, 302, 672, 1558, 3654, 8563,
